item.title: AEMCCO XVI Congress on Social and Health Sciences Methodology
item.description: On 8 and 10 July 2019, the XVI Congress on Social and Health Sciences Methodology was held at the Universidad Aut√≥noma de Madrid (UAM). This event is held biannually, under the auspices of the Spanish Association of Methodology of Behavioral Sciences (AEMCCO). Its aim is to encourage and promote the exchange of knowledge between teachers, researchers, professionals and students interested in methodological issues in the field of Social Sciences, Education, Health and Behavioural Sciences.
